evoter.mobile.abstracts

Class ItemDataActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • evoter.mobile.abstracts.EVoterActivity
        • evoter.mobile.abstracts.ItemDataActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuestionActivity, SessionActivity, SubjectActivity

    public abstract class ItemDataActivity
extends EVoterActivity
    ItemDataActivity is the abstract class of all the item activity of eVoterMobile such as: subject, session, quesiton This is the activity manages view - interaction,.. with list of items.
    Author:
    luongnv89
